bibl.title: Letter from Susan Frost to Laura Armistead Carter, September 16, 1925

div1.p: Frost, a little girl, expresses her love for Laura Carter and wants her to live with her and her parents.

div1.head: Letter from Susan Frost to Laura Armistead Carter, September 16, 1925

opener.dateline:
318 FOREST ROAD
ROLAND PARK
BALTIMORE, MARYLAND

div1.p:
I am so sorry about Dr.
Carter.

Mother and daddy and I love
you as you know and won't
you come live with us?.

I am sending you the little muslin
bag I made it all myself.
I had started to make your
Dear Father of little silk
bag to put his hankes in,
but it never got finished.
remember you still
t have us for your
friends and remember
if you will Come Live
With Us we would love
to have you
